title: ess工具包
author: shenren3-f
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: LocusAzzurro
replies.txt_content:
插件文件夹里ESS文件夹里config.yml配置里修改
找到kit设置里部分的newbies条目，一般应该是：
newbies:
  kit: tools

kit 这项里的 tools（或者这个位置上的别的东西）改成 '' (两个英文单引号) 即可

replies.author: shenren3-f
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: mmoo1122
replies.txt_content:
在ESS配置文件里搜索这一段 # Do we want to give users anything on first join? Set to '' to disable
  # This kit will be given regardless of cost and permissions, and will not trigger the kit delay.
  #kit: ''
  kit: tools
复制代码把tools去掉试试

replies.author: 孤仙肆
replies.txt_content:
ess的配置里面有一个tool
那个就是你进服给的工具包，改一下就可以了
